description:
Ringo’s family runs a super popular apple pie store. The apple pies Ringo’s father makes are so delicious that they quickly sell out. Today, they out in a flash again, so her father starts preparing for the next day. Meanwhile, Ringo, Leila, Natsuki, the Ma-Pets Sei, Dai, and Ryoku are discussing the events from the day before. After finishing some of the work, Sei goes in the kitchen to get a drink of water. Nobody is in the kitchen, but the many apple pies for tomorrow are there. Sei tries his best to hold back his desire to devour them, but the smell and sight is quite overwhelming…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 魔ペット大失敗☆ぷりっ!
